name: Awesomenauts Assemble! Starstorm Expansion
description:
The Starstorm Expansion brings you five all-new Awesomenauts. From the heroic Ted McPain, sneaky Sentry X-58, and the fire-breathing Nibbs to the mysterious space-hitchhiker Skree and honorary Star Scout Penny Fox, the threat posed by the Starstorm station will draw in the very best mercenaries from across the galaxy. Gear up and get ready to determine the fate of the universe with these brand new heroes!

1-3 players
Network Players 2-6
2GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
